TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataRow extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 中的一行数据。

span.span: Represents a row of data in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 并对象是主要组件。The and objects are primary components of a . 使用对象及其属性和方法来检索和评估; 以及插入、 删除和更新中的值。Use the object and its properties and methods to retrieve and evaluate; and insert, delete, and update the values in the . 表示的实际中的对象，和包含描述的架构的对象。The represents the actual objects in the , and the contains the objects that describe the schema of the . 使用重载属性来返回或设置的值。Use the overloaded property to return or set the value of a . 使用并属性来确定特定行值的状态并属性来确定相对于其父行的状态。Use the and properties to determine the status of a particular row value, and the property to determine the state of the row relative to its parent . 若要创建一个新，使用方法的对象。To create a new , use the method of the object. 创建一个新后，使用方法以添加新到。After creating a new , use the method to add the new to the . 最后，调用方法的以确认添加的对象。Finally, call the method of the object to confirm the addition. 有关将数据添加到详细信息，请参阅[将数据添加到 DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-data-to-a-datatable.md)。For more information about adding data to a , see [Adding Data to a DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-data-to-a-datatable.md). 可以删除从通过调用方法，或通过调用方法对象。You can delete a from the by calling the method of the , or by calling the method of the object. 方法从集合中删除行。The method removes the row from the collection. 与此相反，标记删除。In contrast, marks the for removal. 在调用时，会发生实际移除方法。The actual removal occurs when you call method. 通过调用，可以通过编程方式检查哪些行标记为删除前实际删除它们。By calling , you can programmatically check which rows are marked for removal before actually deleting them. 有关详细信息，请参阅[DataRow 删除](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datarow-deletion.md)。For more information, see [DataRow Deletion](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datarow-deletion.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新通过调用方法的对象。The following example creates a new by calling the method of the object. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataRow Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRow Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRow Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRow Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 提交自上次调用 以来对该行进行的所有更改。

span.span: Commits all the changes made to this row since the last time was called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用时，则隐式调用方法来结束的任何编辑。When invoking , the method is implicitly called to end any edits. 如果的行是 Added 或 Modified，变为未更改。If the of the row was Added or Modified, the becomes Unchanged. 如果已删除，删除行。If the was Deleted, the row is removed. 有关更多信息，请参阅 方法。See the method for more information. 类还具有方法，这会影响到整个表所做的更改。The class also has an method which affects changes made to the whole table. 有关详细信息的代码示例演示了如何接受和拒绝对单个数据行的更改，请参阅[AcceptChanges 和 RejectChanges](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/acceptchanges-and-rejectchanges.md)。For more information and a code example that demonstrates how to accept and reject changes to individual data rows, see [AcceptChanges and RejectChanges](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/acceptchanges-and-rejectchanges.md). ## Examples 下面的示例首先创建一个新具有一列，然后创建一个。The following example first creates a new with one column, and then creates a single . 作为是创建、 添加、 修改和删除，其打印。As the is created, added, modified, and deleted, its is printed. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataRow.AcceptChanges Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRow.AcceptChanges Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRow.AcceptChanges Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRow.AcceptChanges Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void BeginEdit() cil managed

summary.span: 对 对象启动编辑操作。

span.span: Starts an edit operation on a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来将进入编辑模式。Use the method to put a into edit mode. 在此模式下，事件会暂停，以便允许用户在对多个行进行更改，而不会触发验证规则。In this mode, events are temporarily suspended, letting the user make changes to more than one row without triggering validation rules. 例如，如果您必须确保为总金额的列的值等于贷项的值和信用行中的列，可以将每个行放到编辑模式，以挂起行值的验证，直到用户尝试提交的值。For example, if you must make sure that the value of the column for a total amount is equal to the values for the debit and credit columns in a row, you can put each row into edit mode to suspend the validation of the row values until the user tries to commit the values. 当用户更改的数据绑定控件，则值隐式调用方法调用时，方法隐式调用方法对象。The method is called implicitly when the user changes the value of a data-bound control; the method is called implicitly when you invoke the method for the object. 在此编辑模式，建议的值将存储原始和新的表示形式。While in this edit mode, the stores representations of the original and new proposed values. 因此，只要尚未调用方法，可以通过传递检索原始或建议版本`DataRowVersion.Original`或`DataRowVersion.Proposed`有关`version`参数的属性。Therefore, as long as the method has not been called, you can retrieve either the original or proposed version by passing either `DataRowVersion.Original` or `DataRowVersion.Proposed` for the `version` parameter of the property. 此外可以通过调用取消任何编辑此时方法。You can also cancel any edits at this point by invoking the method. 若要查看行中是否包含原始或建议值，请调用方法。To see if the row contains an original or proposed value, call the method. > [!NOTE] > 方法会临时挂起事件，但`delete`操作却没有。The method temporarily suspends events, but the `delete` operation does not. ## Examples 该示例将创建一个简单与一个和五个对象，和一个。The example creates a simple with one and five objects, and a . 一个还添加事件处理程序可以监视何时更改行的值。A event handler is also added to monitor when the row's value is changing. 之后调用上的现有行，该约束和事件暂时禁用并打印原始和建议值。After invoking on the existing rows, the constraint and event are temporarily disabled and the original and proposed values are printed. 再次调用将两行设置为相同值。The is again invoked to set two rows to the same value. 当调用时，上完全相同的值强制执行。When is called, the is enforced on the identical values. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataRow.BeginEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRow.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRow.BeginEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRow.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果添加的行，变得`Detached`并在调用时，该行从表中删除。If the of the row is Added, the becomes `Detached` and the row is removed from the table when you call . 变得`Deleted`在使用后上的现有方法。The becomes `Deleted` after you use the method on an existing . 它将保持`Deleted`直到您调用。It remains `Deleted` until you call . 在此期间，从表中删除。At this time, the is removed from the table. 不应调用在 foreach 循环中循环访问时对象。 should not be called in a foreach loop while iterating through a object. 修改集合的状态。 modifies the state of the collection. 已删除的行可以通过调用取消删除。A deleted row can be undeleted by invoking . > [!NOTE] > 方法会临时挂起事件，而删除操作不工作。The method temporarily suspends events, but the delete operation does not. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个简单包含两列和 10 行。The following example creates a simple with two columns and ten rows. 删除多个后项方法，这些行之一通过调用取消删除。After deleting several items with the method, one of the rows is undeleted by invoking . remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能创建或更新的行后调用方法; 同样，必须调用方法来提交编辑。You can only create or update a row after you call the method; similarly, the method must be called to commit the edit. 调用后方法，并在调用之前方法中，内部表示形式的原始和新建议的值存储。After you call the method, and before you call the method, internal representations of the original and new proposed values are stored. 因此，直到您调用，可以使用`version`参数，以指定哪个版本的列的值需要要么`DataRowVersion.Original`或`DataRowVersion.Proposed`。Therefore, until you call the , you can use the `version` argument to specify which version of a column's value you need, either the `DataRowVersion.Original` or `DataRowVersion.Proposed`. 但是，一旦您调用方法中，列的版本将恢复为`DataRowVersion.Original`。However, as soon as you call the method, the version of the column reverts to `DataRowVersion.Original`. 如果是新行，还可以传递`DataRowVersion.Default`参数来检索列的默认值。If the row is new, you can also pass `DataRowVersion.Default` for the parameter to retrieve the column's default value. 传递时`DataRowVersion.Current`，该属性返回当前值，其版本存在的内容。When passing `DataRowVersion.Current`, the property returns the current value, whatever its version may be. > [!NOTE] > 更改为数据绑定控件的值或隐式调用方法对象添加到;调用以下方法时隐式调用方法： 方法对象，方法对象，或方法。The method is called implicitly when you change the value of a data-bound control or when a object is added to the ; the method is called implicitly when you call the following methods: the method of the object, the method of the object, or the method. 与此相反，枚举`Current`返回后的数据的新版调用方法。By contrast, the enumeration `Current` returns the version of the data after the method has been called. `version`参数不应混淆和属性。The `version` argument should not be confused with the property. `version`参数用于描述由相对于列的原始值的列包含的数据的状态。The `version` argument describes the state of the data that is contained by the column relative to the column's original value. 属性描述相对于其父级的整个行的状态。The property describes the state of the whole row relative to its parent . 如果中发生异常时设置属性，则会生成异常事件。When you set the property, an exception is generated if an exception occurs in the event. 如果这是直接编辑，请参阅可以生成的异常。If this is an immediate edit, see for the exceptions that can be generated. ## Examples 下面的示例获取通过列的当前值属性的对象。The following example gets the current value of a column through the property of the object.
